document.full_text: colorado rockies all-star pitcher ubaldo jimenez has been placed on the 15-day disabled list with a cuticle cut on his right thumb, the team said on wednesday.
document.title: rockies pitcher jimenez goes on disabled list
lines_and_colors: colorado rockies all-star pitcher ubaldo jimenez has been placed on the 15-day disabled list with a cuticle cut on his right thumb, the team said on wednesday.
